column4: Is ot a good thing to have a ATA (IDE) to a SATA adaptor converter?  I got a 250HDD ATA but my motherboard is a SATA.. i want to use the 250GB for my OS (Win 7, Win Xp and Ubuntu) and use my 2TB SATA for data storage? good diea?
I have a product suggestion, if you did want to go ahead with it
privmsg, I don't talk about commercial products in help chan :)
